name: dryingTime_decrease
description: This function is used to reduce the operating time of the dryer.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to reduce the drying time.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to reduce the drying time.

parameters.name: dryingTimer
parameters.description: The amount of time in minutes to reduce the drying timer.
